author: karalabe
content:
Here's a small braindump of a possible eth protocol update to help fix transaction propagation woes in the network: https://gist.github.com/karalabe/28aab3a5296d80cf7616a8b8b859131b

I've tried to deliberately make it very non invasive both networking wise as well as implementation wise (i.e. trivial to serve, and can be "converted" to eth/68 to consume). If anyone wants to thorw their 2c, please. I'm more on the idea phase (i.e. nothing is set in stone, I just know what I'd like to achieve and why; the how is the question).
